You come here to ask for
hints, to solve<1"�>
riddle of pyramid?
We heard all hints<1"�>
and tried lots of times but
can't figure it out at all...<1"�>
Is it pointless for
us, try something that<1"�>

You want to solve the pyramid's

different directions.<1"�>
Make sure to not make
any mistakes.

You are asking for a hint to

The red and green statues

You want to find out more about

Also, only 1 statue
should be facing north.

It's rare seeing Denpa Men

know is that the orange statue<1"�>

believe what the child says.<1"�>
They seem to incorrectly remember

Oh, hello there. Asking
about the pyramid, right?<1"�>
The green and orange statues
face the same direction.<1"�>
And the red statue should

The blue statue faces towards<1"�>

Welcome, all of you who attend
this riddle! This is the village<1"�>
of the tribe that guards
and protects the pyramids.<1"�>
Ask the people in the village
for hints on how to solve<1"�>

However, "one" of the people
there is lying.<1"�>
A liar will only tell wrong
